version_description:
Improved phone input
Fixed session token refresh

Fixing ui bug inside fasting screen
Adding layout animation inside fasting screen

Thanks for your feedback!

We've been working on a few issues causing negative feedback:
1. App speed optimisation
2. We've decided to remove phone authentication for it causing bad user experience when trying to login
3. Laggy time selection component

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!

Fixing email input bug, removing whitespaces from entered email
Improving analytics

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!

Fixing some non critical JS bugs, related with undefined properties.

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!


We are preparing full app facelift for all of You!
And with this release we are adding some internal changes which will allow to gracefully transition to new app.

Force update modal message added.

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!

New improved DoFasting features:

• FASTING TRACKER - Your personal fasting timer just got even more convenient! Explore various fasting types and discover which method fits into YOUR lifestyle.
• MEALS - Do Fasting Recommended Meals has changed radically. Now you can access the whole meal data base at once! Select and save your favourite meals, keep up with your recommended calorie intake and make your fasting diet even more effective.
• WORKOUTS- Introducing the new, improved workouts. Set up your workout schedule, choose a fitness level, and lose weight without spending money on gyms & equipment. DoFasting features professionally visualised training routines – warmups, workouts and stretching guides. Train like a professional and enjoy the buzz of hitting “COMPLETE”!
• PROGRESS TRACKER /PROFILE - Start tracking your weight loss progress from the very first day of fasting! Our new profile bar shows your starting, current, and target weight to keep you driven and motivate to achieve desired results. Update your results and change settings with just a few swipes and taps!

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!

We've been working on:
Clickable stat cards inside profile view
Improved meal list performance
Fixed height picker bug
Error message when invalid email is inserted

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

Thanks for your feedback!

We've been working on:
Fixing user authentication functionality in some devices
Fixing push notification permission flow
Fix app state migration after app update

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

To reach clients from all over the world, we recently added the localisation feature to our app. DoFasting is now available in German! Tschüss!
We also fixed some bugs - added the empty state info view you'll see when you have no internet and try to access the app.

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

We have fixed some payment bugs.

Love DoFasting? Rate us 5 stars!

New version has many feature updates:
- Now DoFasting is available in Spanish and Italian.
- Added water tracking feature.
- We upgraded app tracking for future improvements.

Updated version includes the following new features and fixes:
- Updated meals display.
- Added categories to articles.
- More personalised notifications.
- Various fixes.

Updated version includes the following new features and fixes:
- Now French, Portuguese, Norwegian and Swedish languages are available!
- We updated user flow and fixed some minor bugs.

Our latest release has the following updates:
- Fasting data will be connected to a user. Now you can change devices and your fasting progress won’t be lost.
- More motivational fasting messages.

Our latest release has the following updates:
- Upgraded navigation.
- Updated authentication flow.
- Other fixes.
Critical registration fix

- Updated react native to 0.62.2.
- Fixed status bar colours.
- Fixed fasting notifications when reminders are off in settings.
- Other fixes.
